duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform evaluations, determine PT diagnoses and develop a plan of care to restore patient function and improve mobility.
Collaborate with a multi-disciplinary team to support patient care needs and actively participate in team meetings.
Assist in training and supporting team members, volunteers, and students.
Carry out treatment plans, modify for therapeutic benefit, and record patient progress.
Utilize testing results to develop updated plans of care and educate patients and family members about the recovery process.
